messages.subject: HaHaMommy (Diana's) daughter
messages.msgSnippet: I know I d be very interested in hearing updates, knowing when I could light candles and keep them in my thoughts, and knowing where I might be able to buy
messages.messageBody:
" I know I'd be very
interested in hearing updates, knowing when I could light candles and
keep them in my thoughts, and knowing where I might be able to buy
take-out or grocery-store gift certificates or something that could ease
their minds at least a bit."

Yes, could you let us know about this if you get it going Kelli? That
website would be really great.
I was telling my dh who Diana was (someone I've loved since her
earliest posts...that sigline was the BEST; "wackiest widow west of
the Mississipi" I think?) and how everytime I saw her at the
conference, she had a HUGE smile on her face. She positively radiates joy.

I'm feeling SO sad about this. It would feel really good to have some
info. on different ways we can help, aside from letters and cards and
other good wishes.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
